Descriptor.name: Characteristic Instance ID
Descriptor.uuid: 9a 93 96 d7 bd 6a d9 b5 16 46 d2 81 fe f0 46 dc

InformativeText.Abstract: The accessory must expose the instance ID of each characteristic in the Characteristic Instance ID descriptor. The value of the descriptor is a 16-bit unsigned integer encoded as a 2-byte little endian integer.
InformativeText.Summary: The value must support always being read in the clear, i.e. with and without a security session.
